column4: i installed amsn and have a webcam working properly but i cant receive or send video stream, and on properties said is firewalled or behind a router does anyone know how to fix this?
u prolly need to open the ports from or router/firewall ;o
look up ur routers model number and google example "telewel xxx + open ports" then find out what port amsn uses for webcams.
i just dont know where to open the port on kubuntu
